pageTitle: Prime Minister’s itinerary for Tuesday, September 28, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will visit a vaccination clinic, where he will thank health care workers. He will be joined by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland, Jenna Sudds, who was recently elected to represent the riding of Kanata—Carleton, and Mayor of Ottawa Jim Watson.

Notes for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.

1:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability. He will be joined by Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Finance Chrystia Freeland.

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 12:15 p.m.
  • Media wishing to cover the event can contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca for details.
